attributes.action: Provide safe accommodation and support for people experiencing homelessness
attributes.additional_details: Take urgent action to end rough sleeping by funding emergency accommodation, reopening unused buildings, and ensuring support services are accessible to people with complex needs.
attributes.background: We call on the UK Government to provide guaranteed, safe accommodation for people experiencing homelessness, alongside proper mental health, addiction, and employment support. Current systems often fail those with complex needs, leaving them excluded from help rather than supported.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

National rough sleeping programme: permanent, safe accommodation and support
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/747196
